content: Analyze current test implementation status - check what phase we're at according to docs/testing/README.md plan
Fix 31 failing tests - focus on integration and performance test issues
Fix integration test mocking issues in test_analysis_workflows.py
Fix all 15 failing performance tests in test_api_performance.py
Improve unit test coverage gaps (app.py at 83%, ai_client.py at 90%)
Implement Phase 3: Frontend & E2E browser testing (JavaScript, Selenium)
